items.name: color-area
items.title: Color Area
items.description: A 2D color picker area. Headless, accessible, and fully composable.

items.name: use-color
items.title: useColor
items.description: Core hook for color state management. Supports controlled and uncontrolled modes with conversions to all color spaces.

items.name: color-provider
items.title: Color Provider
items.description: React context provider for sharing color state between color-kit components.

items.name: color-slider
items.title: Color Slider
items.description: A 1D color slider for any channel (lightness, chroma, hue, alpha). Headless, accessible, with pointer capture and keyboard navigation.

items.name: hue-slider
items.title: Hue Slider
items.description: A convenience hue slider pre-configured for the hue channel. Wraps ColorSlider.

items.name: alpha-slider
items.title: Alpha Slider
items.description: A convenience alpha/opacity slider pre-configured for the alpha channel. Wraps ColorSlider.

items.name: swatch
items.title: Swatch
items.description: A single color swatch that displays a color. Optionally interactive with click-to-select support.

items.name: swatch-group
items.title: Swatch Group
items.description: A group of color swatches with selection state and keyboard navigation.

items.name: color-input
items.title: Color Input
items.description: A text input for color values with format support (hex, rgb, hsl, oklch). Parses on blur or Enter.

items.name: color-display
items.title: Color Display
items.description: A visual color preview that renders the current color as a background.

items.name: contrast-badge
items.title: Contrast Badge
items.description: Displays the contrast ratio between two colors with WCAG AA/AAA compliance level.
